General.Name: Top Resource Conservation Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Top Resource Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the trading and sale of natural gas, pipeline transportation, urban gas transmission and distribution, gas engineering design, and technical services. The company also provides clean energy development, utilization and industrial services, and energy-saving services for waste heat and pressure utilization, as well as water treatment engineering services. In addition, it engages in the research and development, production, and sale of membrane products; and flue gas treatment investment activities. The company was formerly known as Top Resource Conservation & Environment Corp. and changed its name to Top Resource Energy Co., Ltd. in July 2023. Top Resource Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Beijing, China.
